description:
1.3.1 Update:
          Ability to edit terms with auto-define features.
          Set statistics. Know where you need more work!
          Export sets using email and neato!
          Ability to merge sets together for combo studying
          Bug fixes

***Study Buddy is English only at the moment, we are working on trying to rewrite it for other languages. The most powerful Quizlet app for webOS just got better.  With the ability to merge sets, edit terms, and set statistics, you'll never need to open another app.  Have a test in a few days? Brush up on your classwork using the learn mode, the most powerful teaching mode there is.  Instead of just guessing, use your brain to type in the correct answer, giving you better memory retention. Bring all the power of Quizlet with you wherever you go with Study Buddy!  Designed for Quizlet users by Quizlet users, it has all the power of Quizlet, with a design that’s made specifically for webOS.  With Study Buddy, you can utilize both the familiarize & learn modes of Quizlet.  Get to know your terms quickly with a simple, streamlined interface! Quizlet is the largest flashcard database on the internet, allowing you to study anything you want, whether you're a student preparing for a history test or you want to refresh yourself on the states. It’s your choice.  With a phone this powerful, you shouldn’t have to compromise on the way you learn, and with Study Buddy, you don't have to!
